#summary Install howto for fw-template-erlang

= Introduction =

This page will assist you in installing fw-template-erlang.

= The Easy Way =

If you are running a debian package based system (Debian, Ubuntu, [http://www.finkproject.org/ Mac OS/X with fink], etc.), just go to the 
[http://code.google.com/p/fwtemplates/downloads/list downloads section] and grab the latest {{{.deb}}} files.

= The Less Easy Way =

Prerequisites:
  1. [FramewerkInstall framewerk]
  1. working erlang installation.
     * debian: aptitude install erlang-dev
     * os/x: apt-get install erlang-otp
     * freebsd: pkg_add -r erlang
     * others: ???

Unpack the tarball, then run configure and make check.
{{{
# tar -zxf fw-template-erlang-0.1.21.tar.gz 
# cd fw-template-erlang-0.1.21
# ./configure --prefix=/usr/local && make -s check
}}}
The default prefix is {{{/usr}}} so if you are ok with that then you can omit the prefix argument.  Hopefully you will see something like
{{{
...
PASS: test-template
==================
All 1 tests passed
==================
}}}
If not, the test output is in {{{tests/test-template.out}}}; perhaps it is informative.
